name: Alter Ego V2 Vintage Echo
details:
Vintage echo9 delay types
EREC 2: Binson Echorec 2
DMMC: Electro-Harmonix Deluxe MemoryMan Chorus
T ORG: Tel Ray Organ Tone
2290 M: TC Electronic 2290 Modulated
REV M: Reverse Modulated
BDM2: Boss DM-2
CKAT: Watkins Copykat
EP1: Maestro Echoplex 1*
SP: Roland Space Echo
* exclusive to V2
And
LP – Looper setting
TP - TonePrint setting
